titleHead: [CY] Bilingual documentation - Appeal a benefit decision - GOV.UK
title: [CY] Do you require your appeal documents in English and Welsh (emails, letters, texts, certificates)?
question: [CY] Do you require your appeal documents in English and Welsh (emails, letters, texts, certificates)?
summary: [CY] If you don’t need your document to be translated to Welsh language, please choose No.
answerNo: [CY] All documents will be in English.

errors.required: [CY] Select ‘yes’ if you need your documents to be translated to Welsh.
